column4: another new dolphin was found in Stung Treng province. According to WWF-Cambodia
column5: the calf was spotted on November 20
column6: 2019 at around 8:30 am in Siem Pang District

column10: which is thought to be about five days old.------WWF-Cambodia says this is the 12th dolphin to be born in 2019. Six were recorded in Stung Treng province and six  in Kratie province.
